name: The Mighty Quest for Epic Loot
summary: Raid the world of Opulencia by swiping your way to victory! Crush your enemies and grab some loot in this fast-paced action RPG. Start your quest with the humongous single-player campaign to earn limitless wealth, powerful gear and other sweet loot. Rise to the challenge of each area as the enemy hordes grow, and the bosses become ever-more hulking. On top of the main campaign, you can jump into the PVP Arena to prove your mettle against thousands of other players in The Mighty Quest For Epic Loot's Tournament. There is more, you can always try your hand at a feast of ever-changing, single-player, time-limited events that come stuffed with exclusive rewards, ensuring the loot keeps flowing!
